title: HAP 60 - Though Late, It Is Liberty- Abolitionism in Brazil
itunes:title: HAP 60 - Though Late, It Is Liberty- Abolitionism in Brazil
description: Abolitionists Luiz Gama and Joaquim Nabuco, and the great novelist Machado de Assis, react to the injustices of slaveholding in Brazil.
content:encoded: Abolitionists Luiz Gama and Joaquim Nabuco, and the great novelist Machado de Assis, react to the injustices of slaveholding in Brazil.

itunes:summary: Abolitionists Luiz Gama and Joaquim Nabuco, and the great novelist Machado de Assis, react to the injustices of slaveholding in Brazil.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
